00066 namespace OpenSim {

00068 class Model;

00071 class OSIMANALYSES_API JointReaction : public Analysis 
00072 {
00073 //=============================================================================
00074 // DATA
00075 //=============================================================================
00076 private:
00077 
00078     /* Private struct containing reference indices used to set up the output
00079      *  of each analysed joint.*/
00080     struct JointReactionKey
00081     {
00082         /* name of the joint*/
00083         std::string jointName;
00084         /* index coresponding to the location of the desrired reaction load 
00085         *  in the results of computeReactions()*/
00086         int reactionIndex;
00087         /* body set index of the parent or child body to which the joint
00088         *  reaction is applied*/
00089         int onBodyIndex;
00090         /* body set index of the parent, child, or ground body in which the 
00091         *  joint reaction is expressed*/
00092         int inFrameIndex;
00093     };
00094 
00095 protected:
00096     //--------------------------------------------------------------------
00097     // Properties are the user-specified quantities that are read in from
00098     // file 
00099     //--------------------------------------------------------------------
00100

00103     Array<std::string> &_jointNames;
00104 
00107     PropertyStrArray _onBodyProp;
00108     Array<std::string> &_onBody;
00109 
00112     PropertyStrArray _inFrameProp;
00113     Array<std::string> &_inFrame;
